mapper.select: SELECT q.qna_no, q.qna_title, q.qna_content, q.qna_created_date, q.qna_status, c.category_name, q.answer_content, q.answer_created_date, u.user_nickname, q.answer_user_no FROM USER_QNA q INNER JOIN QNA_CATEGORY c ON q.category_no = c.category_no LEFT JOIN USERS u ON q.answer_user_no = u.user_no WHERE q.qna_no = #{qnaNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_QNA (QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_STATUS, QNA_CREATED_DATE, QNA_ISDELETED, QUESTION_USER_NO, CATEGORY_NO) VALUES (#{qna.qnaTitle}, #{qna.qnaContent}, 0, NOW(), 'N', #{qna.questionUserNo}, #{qna.categoryNo})
mapper.select:
select count(*) as cnt from USER_QNA uq JOIN QNA_CATEGORY qc ON qc.category_no = uq.category_no where
1 = 1
uq.qna_isdeleted = 'N'
and qc.category_name = #{req.category}
and uq.qna_title like concat('%', #{req.keyword}, '%')
and uq.qna_content like concat('%', #{req.keyword}, '%')

select * from ( select uq.qna_no , uq.qna_title , uq.qna_content , uq.qna_created_date , uq.qna_updated_date , u.user_nickname , uq.qna_status , qc.category_name , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY uq.qna_created_date desc) AS rn from USER_QNA uq JOIN QNA_CATEGORY qc ON qc.category_no = uq.category_no JOIN USERS u ON u.user_no = uq.question_user_no where
1 = 1
uq.qna_isdeleted = 'N'
and qc.category_name = #{req.category}
AND uq.qna_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{req.keyword}, '%')
AND uq.qna_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{req.keyword}, '%')
AND qc.category_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{req.keyword}, '%')
AND (uq.qna_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{req.keyword}, '%') OR uq.qna_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{req.keyword}, '%') OR qc.category_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{req.keyword}, '%'))
) AS qna WHERE rn BETWEEN #{req.begin} AND #{req.end} ORDER BY rn
